title: Add Place Order, Add to Cart, Wishlist, Customer Address, UPI Payment & Business Details

requirements.text: Below the price of each candle product card in the Services/Products section, add three action elements: a 'Place Order' button, an 'Add to Cart' button, and a Wishlist heart icon button. All three should be visually styled to match the warm terracotta/sand theme of the shop.

quotes: Buttom of price a button like this Place Order and Add to card and Wishlist icon

acceptanceCriteria: Each product card displays a 'Place Order' button directly below the price
Each product card displays an 'Add to Cart' button below the price
Each product card displays a Wishlist heart icon button
All three elements are consistently styled with the site's warm color theme

requirements.text: Add a Cart area (slide-out drawer or dedicated section) that lists items added via 'Add to Cart'. It should display product name, price, quantity controls, and a subtotal. Cart state should be managed in React state.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking 'Add to Cart' on a product adds it to the cart area
Cart area shows product name, price, and quantity
Cart area shows a subtotal
Cart can be opened/closed by the user
Items can be removed from the cart

requirements.text: Add a Wishlist area (dedicated section or slide-out panel) that lists items saved via the Wishlist heart icon on product cards. Wishlist state should be managed in React state.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the heart icon on a product adds it to the Wishlist area
Wishlist area displays saved products with name and price
Heart icon toggles filled/unfilled to reflect wishlist status
Items can be removed from the wishlist

requirements.text: Add a Customer Address input section in the checkout/order flow (triggered by 'Place Order'). The form should collect: full name, street address, city/town, PIN code, and phone number.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking 'Place Order' opens a modal or section with an address form
Form fields include: full name, street address, city/town, PIN code, and phone number
All fields are validated before submission
Form is styled consistently with the site theme

requirements.text: In the order/checkout flow, offer only UPI as the payment method. Display a UPI payment option with a UPI ID or QR code placeholder. No other payment methods (cash, card, etc.) should be shown.
acceptanceCriteria: Payment section shows only UPI as the payment method
No card or cash-on-delivery options are present
UPI section includes a label and a placeholder UPI ID or QR code area
Payment section is shown after the address form in the order flow

requirements.text: Update the About section text to read: 'It Is My Dream Business'. Update the home/location detail displayed on the site (footer, contact, or about) to show: 'Diamond Harbour, Falta'. Update the contact phone number to '+91 86173 76874'. Update the service tagline to 'Glow Your Beautiful Moments'.

quotes: About is It Is My Dream Buisness
Service Is Glow Your Beautiful Moment's

acceptanceCriteria: About section includes the text 'It Is My Dream Business'
Location 'Diamond Harbour, Falta' is displayed in the footer and/or contact section
Contact phone number shows '+91 86173 76874' in footer and contact section
Service tagline 'Glow Your Beautiful Moments' appears in the hero, services section, or footer

constraints: Only UPI payment method should be offered — do not include card, net banking, or cash on delivery
Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
Cart and Wishlist state should be managed client-side in React state only — no backend changes required
nonGoals: Backend order storage or order history
User authentication for cart or wishlist
WhatsApp order flow replacement (existing WhatsApp buttons may coexist)
